section.name: What is HealthFarm
section.p: HealthFarm is a simple web application based on Tornado, which helps people to understand how Tornado accelates the development process of java web application.
Current version of HealthFarm is demo version. I'm still working on it.

section.name: Demo version restriction
section.p: A lot of features are not implemented in this project, here's a list of functions in HealthFarm.

tr.td: Associate additional information for diet to system users.
Save every day record into database, provide query page.
Maintain the standard daily calorie amount for different kind of people.
Multidimension reports for user diet, and analysis of them.
